catalog_info.notes:

This course has an additional weekly film screening, Friday, 1-3 pm.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: This course welcomes both introductory level and intermediate level students.
catalog_info.description: This course offers returning animators a chance to extend and deepen skills and understanding of animation and to make a more substantial piece of work, alongside introductory level students who will learn some basic tools of animation. Additional exercises encourage students to challenge themselves and explore a range of creative possibilities.
